info.title: Assessment Management API
info.description: API for managing assessments, exams, sections, questions, and student assessments

tags.name: Section Management
tags.description: APIs for managing sections within exams

tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: APIs for user authentication and registration

tags.name: Question Management
tags.description: APIs for managing questions within sections

get.description: Retrieves a specific section by its unique identifier including section name and associated assessment ID

put.description: Updates the name of an existing section within an exam

delete.description: Deletes a section and all its associated questions from an exam

get.description: Retrieves a specific question by its unique identifier including question type, content, image, and associated section ID

put.description: Updates the details of an existing question including type, image, and question content

delete.description: Deletes a question from a section

get.description: Retrieves a specific exam/assessment by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates the details of an existing exam/assessment including name, quiz status, subject, and schedule

delete.description: Deletes an exam/assessment and all its associated sections and questions

get.description: Retrieves the schedule information for a specific exam including assessment date, start time, and end time

put.description: Updates the schedule (date, start time, end time) of an exam. Can only be updated before the exam start date/time
Updates an existing answer by ID

post.description: Starts an assessment when a student begins taking it
Submits a completed assessment with score and duration
Submits a completed assessment along with all question answers
Grades a submitted assessment. Only accessible by teachers and admins
Assigns an assessment to a student. Only accessible by teachers and admins

get.description: Retrieves a list of all exams/assessments in the system with pagination and search support

post.description: Creates a new exam/assessment with optional sections and questions. All sections and questions can be included in the request body.
Creates a copy of an existing exam including all its sections and questions. The cloned exam will have '(Copy)' appended to its name
Creates a new user account in Keycloak. This endpoint does not require authentication.
Authenticates a user and returns JWT access token and refresh token. This endpoint does not require authentication.
Creates or updates an answer for a question. Student ID is automatically extracted from JWT token

get.description: Retrieves a specific assessment for the currently authenticated student
Retrieves all assessments assigned to the currently authenticated student with pagination support

get.summary: Get all exams by its owner
get.description: Retrieves all exams/assessments by its owner with pagination and search support
Retrieves a list of currently active exams with pagination and search support. An exam is active if the current time is within the scheduled start and end time on the assessment date.
Retrieves the answer for a specific question
Retrieves all answers for the current student in a specific assessment with pagination support
Retrieves all answers for a specific assessment with pagination support. Only accessible by teachers and admins
